item.title: Orphaned case
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

Remove the case 15335, and just replace it all with this:

switch(i){ case 15335: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[0] = "Drink"; itemDef.name = "Overload(4)"; //Name itemDef.description = "An overload potion!".getBytes(); itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 61; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 0; itemDef.modelID = 2789; itemDef.modelZoom = 550; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 84; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1996; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; break; }

It shouldn’t be orphaned anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Orphaned case
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

Under switch(i){, if you’re even using switch statements, if not in method ItemDef forID, under itemDef.readValues(stream);
add

switch(i){
                case 15335:
                        itemDef.actions = new String[5];
                        itemDef.actions[0] = "Drink";
                        itemDef.name = "Overload(4)"; //Name
                        itemDef.description = "An overload potion!".getBytes();
                        itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1];
                        itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1];
                        itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 61;
                        itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 0;
                        itemDef.modelID = 2789;
                        itemDef.modelZoom = 550;
                        itemDef.modelRotation1 = 84;
                        itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1996;
                        itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
                        itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
                break;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Orphaned case
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

ok so in my server im adding ints in itemdef.java (doesnt got any ints added) so i add the its under return itemDef;

[code]return itemDef;

	case 15335:
		itemDef.actions = new String[5];
		itemDef.actions[0] = "Drink";
		itemDef.name = "Overload(4)"; //Name
		itemDef.description = "An overload potion!".getBytes();
		itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1];
		itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1];
		itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 61;
		itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 0;
		itemDef.modelID = 2789;
		itemDef.modelZoom = 550;
		itemDef.modelRotation1 = 84;
		itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1996;
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
	break;[/code]

and i get this error .\ItemDef.java:189: orphaned case case 15335: ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
